text: allahge niyogayanta avanata vima sandaha misa, (minisun veta) api kisima dutayeku evuve næta. ebævin (meyata venaskam kara) ovun tamanta tamanma aparadha kara gat avasthavedi oba veta pæmina allah vetin pav ksamava illa sitimin ovun venuven (allahge) dutayada (dutaya vana obat) pav ksamava illa sitiye nam, dayabaravantayeku ha ksama karanneku vasayenda allahva ovun dakinnata tibuni
